# University Elective Allocation Intelligence Dashboard

This is a React + Vite project for analyzing student elective allocation data.

## Development

- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
- Run `npm run build` to build for production
- Run `npm run preview` to preview the production build

## Tech Stack

- React with Vite
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Recharts for data visualization
- Lucide React for icons

## Project Structure

- `src/components/` - React components (Header, SummaryCards, Charts, DataGrid)
- `src/data/` - Student data (225 records)
- `src/hooks/` - Custom hooks for analytics
